modularml.core.model_graph.loss

Classes

AppliedLoss(loss, between, sample_key[, ...])

A base class for different Loss applications (e.g. simple, constrastive, triplet, ...).

Loss([name, backend, loss_function, reduction])

Initiallizes a new Loss term.
